sentences.en: And this brings us to the notion of attribution.
sentences.cn: 这就要我们了解归因这个概念了。

sentences.en: Anti - Japanese War , Yutian County , Hebei Province with geographical attribution of the development of anti - Japanese base changes.
sentences.cn: 抗日战争 时期, 玉田县的地域归属随着冀东 抗日 根据地的发展变更.

sentences.en: Attribution of her success solely to wealth is not fair.
sentences.cn: 认为她的成功完全是因为有财富是不公平的.

sentences.en: Attribution theory is a theory which looks on motivation in a cognitive viewpoint.
sentences.cn: 归因理论是一种以认知的观点看待动机的理论.

sentences.en: Attribution theory is concerned with the study of perceived causation.
sentences.cn: 归因理论是对认识到的因果关系的研究.

sentences.en: Call achieve immediate attribution to show.
sentences.cn: 呼吁立即实现归属显示.

sentences.en: Function: mobile phones and fixed telephone area code attribution to inquiries.
sentences.cn: 功能: 移动电话和固定电话区号归属地查询.

sentences.en: He questioned the attribution of the painting to Picasso.
sentences.cn: 他怀疑这幅画不是毕加索画的.

sentences.en: He refused to utilitarian in nature, refused attribution, refused to contract.
sentences.cn: 他在本质上拒绝功利, 拒绝归属, 拒绝契约.

sentences.en: Methods Attribution approach or factor analysis, causal analysis and induction were adopted.
sentences.cn: 方法主要采用归因法或因子分析法 、 因果分析和归纳法.

sentences.en: Objective : To explore the relation between junior students self - handicapping and attribution.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨初中生 自我 设限和归因的关系.

sentences.en: She doesn't accept my attribution, this is the underlying trouble.
sentences.cn: 最麻烦的是,她不接受我的看法.

sentences.en: So happy with the attribution of this stop you. You want to.
sentences.cn: 让幸福与归属就此驻足吧. 你想.

sentences.en: There's usually a lot of attribution of evil intent to those who have different views.
sentences.cn: 那些持异议者通常多被认为心怀邪念。

sentences.en: This over - attribution of cause and effect probably evolved for survival.
sentences.cn: 在进化过程中,为了得以生存我们才会过度相信有果必有因.
